verses.verse: Then <S%H7891>sang<s%> <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> and <S%H1301>Barak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H42>Abinoam<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
For that the leaders took the <S%H6544>lead<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, For that the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5068>offered<s%> themselves <S%H1288>willingly<s%>, Bless ye <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%>, O ye <S%H4428>kings<s%>; give <S%H238>ear<s%>, O ye <S%H7336>princes<s%>; <S%H7891>I<s%>, even I, will sing unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> praise to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, when thou wentest <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, When thou marchedst <S%H6805>out<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>, The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7493>trembled<s%>, the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> also <S%H5197>dropped<s%>, <S%H5645>Yea<s%>, the clouds <S%H5197>dropped<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>.

The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H5140>quaked<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Even yon <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

In the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8044>Shamgar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6067>Anath<s%>, In the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3278>Jael<s%>, the <S%H734>highways<s%> were <S%H2308>unoccupied<s%>, And the <S%H1980>travellers<s%> <S%H3212>walked<s%> through <S%H6128>byways<s%>.

The <S%H6520>rulers<s%> <S%H2308>ceased<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, they <S%H2308>ceased<s%>, Until that I <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, That I <S%H6965>arose<s%> a <S%H517>mother<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

They <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>; Then was <S%H3901>war<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates<s%>: Was there a <S%H4043>shield<s%> or <S%H7420>spear<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> Among <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is toward the <S%H2710>governors<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, That offered themselves <S%H5068>willingly<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%>: <S%H1288>Bless<s%> ye <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Tell <S%H7878><s%> of <S%H7392>it<s%>, ye that ride on <S%H6715>white<s%> <S%H860>asses<s%>, Ye that <S%H3427>sit<s%> on rich <S%H4055>carpets<s%>, And ye that <S%H1980>walk<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>.

Far from the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H2686>archers<s%>, in the places of drawing <S%H4857>water<s%>, There shall they <S%H8567>rehearse<s%> the righteous <S%H6666>acts<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Even the righteous <S%H6666>acts<s%> of his <S%H6520>rule<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. Then the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H8179>gates<s%>.

Awake <S%H5782><s%>, <S%H5782>awake<s%>, <S%H1683>Deborah<s%>; <S%H5782>Awake<s%>, <S%H5782>awake<s%>, <S%H1696>utter<s%> a <S%H7892>song<s%>: <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, <S%H1301>Barak<s%>, and lead away <S%H7628>thy<s%> <S%H7617>captives<s%>, thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H42>Abinoam<s%>.
Then came down a <S%H8300>remnant<s%> of the <S%H117>nobles<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%>; <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came down for me <S%H7287>against<s%> the <S%H1368>mighty<s%>.

Out of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> came down they whose <S%H8328>root<s%> is in <S%H6002>Amalek<s%>; <S%H310>After<s%> <S%H1144>thee<s%>, Benjamin, among thy <S%H5971>peoples<s%>; Out of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H2710>governors<s%>, And out of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> they that <S%H4900>handle<s%> the <S%H5608>marshal<s%>'s <S%H7626>staff<s%>.

And the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> were with <S%H1683>Deborah<s%>; As was <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, so was <S%H1301>Barak<s%>; Into the <S%H6010>valley<s%> they <S%H7971>rushed<s%> forth at his <S%H7272>feet<s%>. By the <S%H6390>watercourses<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> There were <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2711>resolves<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

Why <S%H3427>sattest<s%> thou <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H4942>sheepfolds<s%>, To <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8292>pipings<s%> for the <S%H5739>flocks<s%>? At the <S%H6390>watercourses<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> There were <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2714>searchings<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

Gilead <S%H1568><s%> <S%H7931>abode<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>: And <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, why did he <S%H1481>remain<s%> in <S%H591>ships<s%>? <S%H836>Asher<s%> sat <S%H3427>still<s%> at the <S%H2348>haven<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, And <S%H7931>abode<s%> by his <S%H4664>creeks<s%>.

Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> was a <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H2778>jeoparded<s%> their <S%H5315>lives<s%> unto the <S%H4191>death<s%>, And <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, upon the high <S%H4791>places<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

The <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%>; Then <S%H3898>fought<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>. In <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> by the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%>: They <S%H3947>took<s%> no <S%H1215>gain<s%> of <S%H3701>money<s%>.
From <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> the <S%H3556>stars<s%>, From their <S%H4546>courses<s%> they <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H5516>Sisera<s%>.

The <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H7028>Kishon<s%> swept them <S%H1640>away<s%>, That <S%H6917>ancient<s%> <S%H5158>river<s%>, the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H7028>Kishon<s%>. O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, march <S%H1869>on<s%> with <S%H5797>strength<s%>.
Then did the <S%H6119>horsehoofs<s%> <S%H1986>stamp<s%> By reason of the <S%H1726>prancings<s%>, the <S%H1726>prancings<s%> of their strong <S%H47>ones<s%>.

Curse <S%H779><s%> ye <S%H4789>Meroz<s%>, <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. <S%H779>Curse<s%> ye <S%H779>bitterly<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> <S%H935>thereof<s%>, Because they came not to the <S%H5833>help<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, To the <S%H5833>help<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> against the <S%H1368>mighty<s%>.

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> above <S%H802>women<s%> shall <S%H3278>Jael<s%> <S%H802>be<s%>, The wife of <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H7017>Kenite<s%>; <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> shall she be above <S%H802>women<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%>.
He <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>, and she <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H2461>milk<s%>; She brought <S%H7126>him<s%> <S%H2529>butter<s%> in a <S%H117>lordly<s%> <S%H5602>dish<s%>.

She <S%H7971>put<s%> her <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H3489>tent-pin<s%>, And her right <S%H3225>hand<s%> to the <S%H6001>workmen<s%>'s <S%H1989>hammer<s%>; And with the hammer she <S%H1986>smote<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%>, she smote <S%H4277>through<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%>; <S%H4272>Yea<s%>, she pierced and struck <S%H2498>through<s%> his <S%H7541>temples<s%>.

At her <S%H7272>feet<s%> he <S%H3766>bowed<s%>, he <S%H5307>fell<s%>, he <S%H7901>lay<s%>; At her <S%H7272>feet<s%> he <S%H3766>bowed<s%>, he <S%H5307>fell<s%>; <S%H834>Where<s%> he <S%H3766>bowed<s%>, there he fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H7703>dead<s%>.

Through the <S%H2474>window<s%> she <S%H8259>looked<s%> <S%H2980>forth<s%>, and cried, The <S%H517>mother<s%> of Sisera <S%H2980>cried<s%> through the <S%H822>lattice<s%>, Why is his <S%H7393>chariot<s%> so <S%H954>long<s%> in <S%H935>coming<s%>? Why <S%H309>tarry<s%> the <S%H6471>wheels<s%> of his <S%H4818>chariots<s%>?
Her <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H8282>ladies<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7725>her<s%>, Yea, she returned answer to <S%H561>herself<s%>,

Have they not <S%H4672>found<s%>, have they not <S%H2505>divided<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%>? A <S%H7356>damsel<s%>, <S%H7361>two<s%> damsels to <S%H7218>every<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%>; To <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> a <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of <S%H6648>dyed<s%> <S%H7998>garments<s%>, A spoil of <S%H6648>dyed<s%> garments <S%H7553>embroidered<s%>, Of <S%H6648>dyed<s%> garments embroidered on both <S%H7553>sides<s%>, on the <S%H6677>necks<s%> of the <S%H7998>spoil<s%>?

So let all thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: But let them that <S%H157>love<s%> him be as the <S%H8121>sun<s%> when he goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> in his <S%H1369>might<s%>. And the <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H8252>rest<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.
